roleset.name: make babbling sounds
roleset.note: BABBLE-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Claire. (from babble.01-v)

example.name: Baby babble
example.text: She babbled a lot, in an age-appropriate way with reduplicated syllables.
example.arg: in an age-appropriate way with reduplicated syllables

example.name: With topic
example.text: He babbled all about the surprise party we had planned.
example.arg: all about the surprise party we had planned
